import React from 'react' import { cartInfo } from '../../data/cart' import './Cart.css' import { Totalsummary } from './Totalsummary' export const Cart = () => { return (

Your Shopping Cart

{ cartInfo.map((cartItem) => { return

Title : {cartItem.title}

Authors : {cartItem.author}

{cartItem.quantity}
{cartItem.price * cartItem.quantity}$
}) }
) }
